page.title: 12GIRL GUIDES (continued)
page.content: like this: {"I promise that I will do my best, to {do my duty to God. To serve the Queen {and help other people and to keep the {guide law." When you have said your promise you are given a special promise badge which is bronze and shaped like a three leafed clover. You are also given a patrol badge which identifies which patrol you are in. You are given a pack badge as well which identifies which pack you are in. I am in Nightingale and my patrol leader is Mary. I am in pack 2nd Penton and my guider is Mrs. Dearden. I bring my subs in every week which is twenty pence, and that pays for all the outings we go on. Emma and I have been on an outing to Farnborough with the guides and we went canoeing which was great fun.
